processes.title: Annual Life Review & Goal Setting
processes.description: End-of-year reflection and goal-setting process for career and life
steps: Conduct end-of-year reflection on career and life progress
Identify and prioritize top goals for the coming year
Calculate financial targets using My Financial Future
Document decisions and rationale in Notion
Print out key goals and financial targets for daily visibility

processes.title: Blog Post Writing Workflow
processes.description: A systematic approach to writing impactful blog posts, starting from authentic inspiration and leveraging AI and human feedback

processes.title: Daily Task & Schedule Management
processes.description: A streamlined system for managing daily tasks, meetings, and communications
steps: Schedule meetings and events in Google Calendar
Manage daily tasks in Microsoft To Do
Capture quick thoughts in Apple Notes

processes.title: Project-Based Learning Workflow
processes.description: A practical approach to learning through building meaningful projects, with emphasis on documentation and knowledge sharing

processes.title: Deciding What to Work On Next
processes.description: A systematic approach to evaluating new projects and opportunities
steps: Evaluate if project accelerates primary goals
Default to 'No' if unsure about value

processes.title: Personal Relationship Management
processes.description: A systematic approach to maintaining meaningful connections
steps: Log interactions and meeting notes in Notion
Regularly review top contacts to stay in touch
Send thoughtful follow-ups or e-cards via BlessOut
Record voice reflections after key meetings using Anno

processes.title: Staying Open to Suggestions
processes.description: A process for discovering and evaluating new tools and workflows
steps: Collect recommendations from friends and online sources
Research tools using Perplexity and X (Twitter)
Track interesting suggestions for future reference
